title: Remove unused method params in faceting code
description:
FacetComponent.enqueuePivotFacetShardRequests has unused param HashMap<String,List<String>> pivotFacetRefinements
	FacetComponent.modifyRequestForRangeFacets has unused param FacetInfo fi
	FacetComponent.maxPossible has unused param ShardFacetCount sfc
	PivotFacet.getTrimmedPivotsAsListOfNamedLists has unused param ResponseBuilder rb
